# iosxr_aaa (Resource)

This resource can manage the AAA configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_aaa" "example" {
  default_taskgroup = "FULL-TGRP"
  banner_login      = "^C AAA Banner! ^C"
  radius_server_groups = [
    {
      group_name = "RADIUS-1"
      servers = [
        {
          order     = 1
          address   = "10.1.1.1"
          auth_port = 1812
          acct_port = 1813
        }
      ]
      load_balance_method_least_outstanding_batch_size              = 25
      load_balance_method_least_outstanding                         = true
      load_balance_method_least_outstanding_ignore_preferred_server = true
      deadtime                                                      = 5
      throttle_access                                               = 100
      throttle_access_timeout                                       = 5
      throttle_accounting                                           = 50
      server_privates = [
        {
          order            = 1
          address          = "10.1.1.2"
          auth_port        = 1812
          acct_port        = 1813
          key_type_7       = "045802150C2E0C"
          timeout          = 120
          retransmit       = 5
          test_username    = "cisco"
          idle_time        = 30
          ignore_auth_port = true
          ignore_acct_port = true
        }
      ]
      vrf                                         = "VRF1"
      source_interface                            = "Loopback0"
      authorization_request_accept                = true
      authorization_request_radius_attribute_list = "AUTH-REQ-LIST"
      authorization_reply_reject                  = true
      authorization_reply_radius_attribute_list   = "AUTH-REPLY-LIST"
      accounting_request_accept                   = true
      accounting_request_radius_attribute_list    = "ACCT-REQ-LIST"
      accounting_reply_reject                     = true
      accounting_reply_radius_attribute_list      = "ACCT-REPLY-LIST"
    }
  ]
  server_radius_dynamic_author_port              = 3799
  server_radius_dynamic_author_ignore_server_key = true
  server_radius_dynamic_author_server_key_type_7 = "03075218050061"
  server_radius_dynamic_author_clients = [
    {
      address           = "10.1.1.10"
      vrf               = "VRF1"
      server_key_type_7 = "03075218050061"
    }
  ]
  tacacs_server_groups = [
    {
      group_name = "TACACS-1"
      servers = [
        {
          order   = 10
          address = "9.0.1.68"
        }
      ]
      vrf           = "VRF1"
      holddown_time = 300
      server_privates = [
        {
          order                          = 10
          address                        = "9.0.1.68"
          port                           = 49
          key_type_7                     = "0235347225301B204F4F0A0A"
          single_connection              = true
          single_connection_idle_timeout = 1000
          timeout                        = 10
          holddown_time                  = 300
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
  usernames = [
    {
      order                = 3
      name                 = "terraform-user"
      secret_type_10       = "$6$JX.ze16kjuwfCe1.$aAaA/Zc0/lI2C7VrT4PmeBh.tsQj1fKAR3q.Oqq214vrnCLjhezD9/asda5WB8tbO4wqKp3MsA5cv3B2uHJOj/"
      login_history_enable = true
      group_root_lr        = true
    }
  ]
  taskgroups = [
    {
      group_name                      = "FULL-TGRP"
      description                     = "Read Only Taskgroup"
      task_read_bgp                   = true
      task_read_ospf                  = true
      task_read_hsrp                  = true
      task_read_isis                  = true
      task_read_route_map             = true
      task_read_route_policy          = true
      task_read_static                = true
      task_read_vrrp                  = true
      task_read_cef                   = true
      task_read_lpts                  = true
      task_read_ipv4                  = true
      task_read_rib                   = true
      task_read_multicast             = true
      task_read_mpls_te               = true
      task_read_mpls_ldp              = true
      task_read_mpls_static           = true
      task_read_ouni                  = true
      task_read_fabric                = true
      task_read_bundle                = true
      task_read_network               = true
      task_read_transport             = true
      task_read_ppp                   = true
      task_read_hdlc                  = true
      task_read_pos_dpt               = true
      task_read_sonet_sdh             = true
      task_read_dwdm                  = true
      task_read_tunnel                = true
      task_read_vlan                  = true
      task_read_qos                   = true
      task_read_acl                   = true
      task_read_aaa                   = true
      task_read_crypto                = true
      task_read_snmp                  = true
      task_read_config_mgmt           = true
      task_read_config_services       = true
      task_read_host_services         = true
      task_read_boot                  = true
      task_read_fault_mgr             = true
      task_read_filesystem            = true
      task_read_interface             = true
      task_read_ip_services           = true

      task_read_ext_access            = true

      task_read_logging               = true
      task_read_netflow               = true
      task_read_drivers               = true
      task_read_fr                    = true
      task_read_monitor               = true
      task_read_inventory             = true
      task_read_ipv6                  = true
      task_read_admin                 = true
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `banner_login` (String) c banner-text c, where 'c' is a delimiting character
- `default_taskgroup` (String) Default taskgroup to be used for remote authentication
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `attributes`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `radius_server_groups` (Attributes List) Radius Server Groups (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--radius_server_groups))
- `server_radius_dynamic_author_clients` (Attributes List) COA client configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--server_radius_dynamic_author_clients))
- `server_radius_dynamic_author_ignore_server_key` (Boolean) ignore  server-key
- `server_radius_dynamic_author_port` (Number) Specify the COA Server port to listen on
  - Range: `1000`-`5000`
- `server_radius_dynamic_author_server_key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `server_radius_dynamic_author_server_key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `tacacs_server_groups` (Attributes List) TACACS Server Groups (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups))
- `taskgroups` (Attributes List) Taskgroup name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--taskgroups))
- `usergroups` (Attributes List) Usergroup name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--usergroups))
- `usernames` (Attributes List) User name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--usernames))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--radius_server_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `radius_server_groups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Server group name

Optional:

- `accounting_reply_accept` (Boolean) Accounting reply accept
- `accounting_reply_radius_attribute_list` (String) Accounting reply RADIUS attribute list
- `accounting_reply_reject` (Boolean) Accounting reply reject
- `accounting_request_accept` (Boolean) Accounting request accept
- `accounting_request_radius_attribute_list` (String) Accounting request RADIUS attribute list
- `accounting_request_reject` (Boolean) Accounting request reject
- `authorization_reply_accept` (Boolean) Authorization reply accept
- `authorization_reply_radius_attribute_list` (String) Authorization reply RADIUS attribute list
- `authorization_reply_reject` (Boolean) Authorization reply reject
- `authorization_request_accept` (Boolean) Authorization request accept
- `authorization_request_radius_attribute_list` (String) Authorization request RADIUS attribute list
- `authorization_request_reject` (Boolean) Authorization request reject
- `deadtime` (Number) Dead time in minutes
- `load_balance_method_least_outstanding` (Boolean) Use least outstanding load balancing method
- `load_balance_method_least_outstanding_batch_size` (Number) Batch size for load balancing
- `load_balance_method_least_outstanding_ignore_preferred_server` (Boolean) Ignore preferred server
- `server_privates` (Attributes List) Specify a private RADIUS server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--radius_server_groups--server_privates))
- `servers` (Attributes List) Specify a RADIUS server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--radius_server_groups--servers))
- `source_interface` (String) Source interface
- `throttle_access` (Number) Throttle access requests
- `throttle_access_timeout` (Number) Throttle access timeout
- `throttle_accounting` (Number) Throttle accounting requests
- `vrf` (String) VRF name

<a id="nestedatt--radius_server_groups--server_privates"></a>
### Nested Schema for `radius_server_groups.server_privates`

Required:

- `acct_port` (Number) Accounting port
- `address` (String) IP address or hostname
- `auth_port` (Number) Authentication port
- `order` (Number) Ordering index

Optional:

- `idle_time` (Number) Idle time in minutes
- `ignore_acct_port` (Boolean) Ignore accounting port
- `ignore_auth_port` (Boolean) Ignore authentication port
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Type 6 encrypted key
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Type 7 encrypted key
- `retransmit` (Number) Retransmit count
- `test_username` (String) Test username
- `timeout` (Number) Timeout in seconds


<a id="nestedatt--radius_server_groups--servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `radius_server_groups.servers`

Required:

- `acct_port` (Number) Accounting port
- `address` (String) IP address or hostname
- `auth_port` (Number) Authentication port
- `order` (Number) Ordering index



<a id="nestedatt--server_radius_dynamic_author_clients"></a>
### Nested Schema for `server_radius_dynamic_author_clients`

Required:

- `address` (String) COA client configuration
- `vrf` (String) VRF to which COA Client belongs

Optional:

- `server_key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `server_key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow


<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_server_groups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Server group name

Optional:

- `holddown_time` (Number) Holddown time in minutes
- `server_privates` (Attributes List) Specify a private TACACS server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--server_privates))
- `servers` (Attributes List) Specify a TACACS server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--servers))
- `vrf` (String) VRF name

<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--server_privates"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_server_groups.server_privates`

Required:

- `address` (String) IP address or hostname
- `order` (Number) Ordering index
- `port` (Number) TCP port

Optional:

- `holddown_time` (Number) Holddown time in minutes
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Type 6 encrypted key
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Type 7 encrypted key
- `single_connection` (Boolean) Use single connection
- `single_connection_idle_timeout` (Number) Single connection idle timeout in seconds
- `timeout` (Number) Timeout in seconds


<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_server_groups.servers`

Required:

- `address` (String) IP address or hostname
- `order` (Number) Ordering index



<a id="nestedatt--taskgroups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `taskgroups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Taskgroup name

Optional:

- `description` (String) Description for the task group
- `inherit_taskgroup_cisco_support` (Boolean) Technical support group
- `inherit_taskgroup_netadmin` (Boolean) Network administrators taskgroup
- `inherit_taskgroup_operator` (Boolean) Operator taskgroup
- `inherit_taskgroup_root_lr` (Boolean) Root LR taskgroup
- `inherit_taskgroup_serviceadmin` (Boolean) Service administrators taskgroup
- `inherit_taskgroup_sysadmin` (Boolean) System administrators taskgroup
- `inherit_taskgroups` (Attributes List) Name of the task group to include (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--taskgroups--inherit_taskgroups))
- `task_debug_aaa` (Boolean) AAA
- `task_debug_acl` (Boolean) Access Control List
- `task_debug_admin` (Boolean) Admin plane functions
- `task_debug_ancp` (Boolean) Access Node Control Protocol
- `task_debug_atm` (Boolean) Asynchronous Transfer Mode
- `task_debug_basic_services` (Boolean) Ping, show version/privileges, etc.
- `task_debug_bcdl` (Boolean) Bulk Content Downloader
- `task_debug_bfd` (Boolean) Bidirectional Forwarding Protocol
- `task_debug_bgp` (Boolean) Border Gateway Protocol
- `task_debug_boot` (Boolean) reload, boot
- `task_debug_bundle` (Boolean) Bundles
- `task_debug_call_home` (Boolean) call-home
- `task_debug_cdp` (Boolean) Cisco Discovery Protocol
- `task_debug_cef` (Boolean) Cisco Express Forwarding/FIB
- `task_debug_cgn` (Boolean) Carrier Grade Nat
- `task_debug_config_mgmt` (Boolean) Create/copy/delete configuration checkpoints
- `task_debug_config_services` (Boolean) Configure/monitor web server, ORB, SSH, XML Agent.
- `task_debug_cpri` (Boolean) cpri controller taskid
- `task_debug_crypto` (Boolean) ipsec, ssl
- `task_debug_diag` (Boolean) exception, coredump, itrace, monitor, stats
- `task_debug_dossier` (Boolean) Support for dossier related collection/CLIs
- `task_debug_drivers` (Boolean) Driver related functions
- `task_debug_dwdm` (Boolean) DWDM Transport
- `task_debug_eem` (Boolean) Embedded Event Manager
- `task_debug_eigrp` (Boolean) Enhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol
- `task_debug_ethernet_services` (Boolean) Ethernet Services and OAM
- `task_debug_ext_access` (Boolean) Execute RCP, RSH, FTP, TFTP, rlogin, telnet, ...
- `task_debug_fabric` (Boolean) Fabric Management
- `task_debug_fault_mgr` (Boolean) Configure/monitor fault manager settings
- `task_debug_fc` (Boolean) Fibre Channel controller taskid
- `task_debug_filesystem` (Boolean) Execute rcs, erase, format, fsck, etc.
- `task_debug_firewall` (Boolean) Firewall operations
- `task_debug_fr` (Boolean) Frame-Relay
- `task_debug_fti` (Boolean) Support for FTI CLIs
- `task_debug_hdlc` (Boolean) High-level Data Link Control
- `task_debug_host_services` (Boolean) Configure/monitor hostname, clock, timestamps, etc.
- `task_debug_hsrp` (Boolean) Hot Standby Routing Protocol
- `task_debug_interface` (Boolean) Configure/monitor basic (or common) interface characteristics
- `task_debug_inventory` (Boolean) Inventory information management
- `task_debug_ip_services` (Boolean) Configure/monitor DNS, DHCP, ARP, NTP, ARM, Domain services
- `task_debug_ipv4` (Boolean) IPv4
- `task_debug_ipv6` (Boolean) IPv6
- `task_debug_isis` (Boolean) Intermediate System-Intermediate System
- `task_debug_l2rib` (Boolean) Layer 2 RIB
- `task_debug_l2vpn` (Boolean) Layer 2 VPN
- `task_debug_li` (Boolean) Lawful Intercept component
- `task_debug_lisp` (Boolean) Locator/Identifier Separation Protocol
- `task_debug_lldp` (Boolean) Support LLDP protocol
- `task_debug_logging` (Boolean) logging, alarm
- `task_debug_lpts` (Boolean) Local Packet Transport Service
- `task_debug_monitor` (Boolean) Monitor system resource/performance characteristics
- `task_debug_mpls_ldp` (Boolean) Multi-protocol Label Switching - Label Distribution Protocol
- `task_debug_mpls_static` (Boolean) Multi-protocol Label Switching - Static configuration
- `task_debug_mpls_te` (Boolean) Multi-protocol Label Switching - Traffic Engineering
- `task_debug_multicast` (Boolean) Multicast management including PIM, IGMP, etc.
- `task_debug_nacm` (Boolean) Netconf Authorization Control Module
- `task_debug_netflow` (Boolean) Netflow application
- `task_debug_network` (Boolean) IPv4, IPv6, ICMP, CLNS, ...

- `task_debug_otn` (Boolean) Optical Transport Network
- `task_debug_ouni` (Boolean) Optical UNI

<a id="nestedatt--taskgroups--inherit_taskgroups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `taskgroups.inherit_taskgroups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Name of the task group to include



<a id="nestedatt--usergroups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `usergroups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Usergroup name

Optional:

- `description` (String) Description for the user group
- `inherit_usergroups` (Attributes List) User group to be inherited by this group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--usergroups--inherit_usergroups))
- `taskgroup_cisco_support` (Boolean) Technical support group
- `taskgroup_maintenance` (Boolean) Maintenance group
- `taskgroup_netadmin` (Boolean) Network administrators group
- `taskgroup_operator` (Boolean) Operator group
- `taskgroup_provisioning` (Boolean) Provisioning group
- `taskgroup_read_only` (Boolean) Read only group
- `taskgroup_retrieve` (Boolean) Retrieve group
- `taskgroup_root_lr` (Boolean) Root LR group
- `taskgroup_serviceadmin` (Boolean) Service administrators group
- `taskgroup_sysadmin` (Boolean) System administrators group
- `taskgroups` (Attributes List) Name of the task group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--usergroups--taskgroups))

<a id="nestedatt--usergroups--inherit_usergroups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `usergroups.inherit_usergroups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) User group to be inherited by this group


<a id="nestedatt--usergroups--taskgroups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `usergroups.taskgroups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Name of the task group



<a id="nestedatt--usernames"></a>
### Nested Schema for `usernames`

Required:

- `name` (String) User name
- `order` (Number) This is used to sort the users in the order of precedence
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `directory` (String) Specify the directory of the user
- `group_cisco_support` (Boolean) Cisco support personnel
- `group_maintenance` (Boolean) Maintenance group
- `group_netadmin` (Boolean) Network administrators group
- `group_operator` (Boolean) Operator group
- `group_provisioning` (Boolean) Provisioning group
- `group_read_only_tg` (Boolean) Read only group
- `group_retrieve` (Boolean) Retrieve group
- `group_root_lr` (Boolean) Root LR group
- `group_serviceadmin` (Boolean) Service administrators group
- `group_sysadmin` (Boolean) System administrators group
- `login_history_disable` (Boolean) Disable the display of login history.
- `login_history_enable` (Boolean) Enable the display of login history.
- `policy` (String) Specify the policy common to password and secret for the user
- `secret_type_10` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that SHA512 encrypted password will follow
- `secret_type_8` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that SHA-256 encrypted password will follow
- `secret_type_9` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that scrypt encrypted password will follow
- `shell_type` (String) Specify the shell type of the user
- `user_groups` (Attributes List) Name of the user group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--usernames--user_groups))

<a id="nestedatt--usernames--user_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `usernames.user_groups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Name of the user group

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_aaa.example ""
```
